sentences.en: But this hand - mirror of milk under my nose is sluggishly opaque.
sentences.cn: 而我鼻子下这面牛奶的镜子却浓稠得混浊.

sentences.en: Can converge into the rivers to flow trickling sluggishly and thinly.
sentences.cn: 是涓涓细流可以汇成江河.

sentences.en: He saw the phosphorescent glimmer of a shark, like a sea ghost, drift sluggishly by.
sentences.cn: 他看见一只鲨鱼懒洋洋地从旁边游了过去,磷光闪闪的, 宛如大海的鬼魂.

sentences.en: House edge alongside the clear stream trickling sluggishly the environment elegant.
sentences.cn: 宅边、道旁清流涓涓,环境优雅.

sentences.en: In the centre of the yard, a few loose chickens were sluggishly wandering around.
sentences.cn: 在院子里, 还有几只散放的鸡在慢腾腾地走着.

sentences.en: Loaded with 870 gallons of gasoline and 40 gallons of oil, the ship moved sluggishly.
sentences.cn: 飞机载着八百七十加仑汽油和四十加仑机油, 缓慢地前进了.

sentences.en: SOME LINES WILL differentiate into only certain cell types; others grow sluggishly in culture.
sentences.cn: 有些细胞株只能分化出特定的细胞类型, 有些细胞株在培养时生长迟缓.

sentences.en: The company has responded sluggishly to these changes in technology.
sentences.cn: 该公司对这些技术上的变化反应迟缓。

sentences.en: The economies are coming out of recession, sluggishly, and it's modest growth on the positive side for a foreseeable future.
sentences.cn: 经济正从衰退中慢慢地走出来，并且我们在可以预见的未来看到了积极的适度的增长。

sentences.en: The river is silted up and the water flows sluggishly.
The wide road was blocked solid with traffic that moved along sluggishly.
sentences.cn: 宽阔的马路被缓慢前行的车辆堵得严严实实。

sentences.en: They ticked by sluggishly almost as if they were doing it just to annoy me.
sentences.cn: 这些价格变地迟缓,好像他们这样做只是为了激怒我.

sentences.en: Two Covenant ships sluggishly changed course and intercepted the MAC slugs.
sentences.cn: 两艘圣约人飞船缓慢转变方向拦截磁力加速炮弹.

sentences.en: You may have noticed this when driving: those distant phone poles pass sluggishly while the ones on the road go zooming by.
sentences.cn: 你或许会在开车时有这种感觉：远处的电线杆移动的很慢，而路边的电线杆则移动的很快。

words.tran_cn: 萧条的；迟钝的；行动迟缓的；懒惰的

trans.tran_cn: [医]adv.缓慢地，迟钝地，呆滞地，慢慢腾腾
